metadata.name: Six Bearded Men 1967
metadata.description: 5K PCScan_2022_238 of " Six Bearded Men" created in 1967, size 33"x34" unique plotter IBM 7094 and drum plotter by computer art pioneer Charles Csuri. This picture is Csuri's early experimentation with generative image transformation by equation. It is one of the first examples of random mathematical distortion and deliberate coded placement of data. Plotter direct from the Csurivision estate.
